text: Coteau Bourgeois is an unincorporated community in Livingston Parish, Louisiana, United States. The community is located southeast of French Settlement and west of Sorrento. The site is on Louisiana Highway 22 and is one mile south of Head of Island on the Amite River.French Settlement, LA, 7.5 Minute Topographic Quadrangle, USGS, 1991 ==Etymology== In the French language the word Coteau means Hill and Bourgeois was the name for a wealthy class of French citizens in the late 18th century. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Livingston Parish, Louisiana Category:Unincorporated communities in Louisiana
title: Coteau Bourgeois, Louisiana
